page.title: 17CRAFTS IN THE OLD MILLS
page.content: The older industries in Otley and the district were mainly textiles and engineering, with some paper manufacture. These have now closed down.One of the old mills, called Otley Mills, is on the Ilkley road, and it has now been developed into a lot of workshops. One of them makes furniture by hand, and the things they make are very expensive and high quality. Another one is run by a man who makes pianos. There is also a shop selling camping and outdoor things. Prince Henry's Grammar School runs some night classes for people who want to learn new craft skills, and these are quite well attended. A lot of people think that crafts are a good thing for today because they help you to relax.
